rewrite_iterations.rewritten_text: That does sound like a tough decision. You might try this: 1) Write down the pros and cons of focusing on art sales versus applying for the part-time job, 2) Consider which option aligns more with your immediate financial needs, and 3) Trust your instincts to make the choice that feels right for you.
